biography_text: DeSANTIS, Ron, a Representative from Florida; born in Jacksonville, Duval County, Fla., September 14, 1978; graduated from Dunedin High School, Dunedin, Fla., 1997; B.A., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 2001; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2005; United States Navy, 2004-2010; United States Navy Reserve, 2010-present; author; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
